name: Pepper Salsa
keywords: appetizer, side dish, chili pepper, tomato, raw, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 large sweet red pepper, cored, seeded and chopped
1 large sweet yellow pepper, cored, seeded and chopped
1 large ripe tomato or 4 ripe plum tomatoes, chopped fine
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat four tablespoons of the oil in a large skillet. Add the onion and saute until transluscent. Stir in the garlic, red pepper, yellow pepper and chili pepper and saute until the peppers are tender.
Stir in the tomato and sun-dried tomatoes and cook until the sauce has thickened, about 10 minutes.
Add the vinegar, scallions, coriander and remaining tablespoon of the oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve.
